Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite/Sharpclaws/Deepfear/Charon/Underground:

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: You won't regret it...!!!

Aelo: Well Sharpclaws...
Celeno: Can you lead us to Battle?
Ocipite: Darkfate should meet out new fellow, Scorponok ...

***************
Sharpclaws::

"Are you ready?" said the trasmetal mole, he transformed in a tank 
and the other males too. Sharpclaws  and told to Scorponok "Up, I'm 
fast and we could reach our troops quickly"

The three femmes transformed to beast mode and were ready to fly.
